org.gvsig.fmap.dal.resource.spi

Class AbstractResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.fmap.dal.resource.spi.AbstractResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resource, ResourceProvider, Observable, WeakReferencingObservable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDBResourceBlocker, AbstractNonBlockingResource, FileResource, MultiResource, OGRResource

    public abstract class AbstractResource
extends Object
implements ResourceProvider, WeakReferencingObservable

    Base implementation for Resource

    This implementation not define the Resource#begin() and Resource#end()

      • closeRequest

        public void closeRequest()
                  throws ResourceException
        Description copied from interface: Resource
        If the resource is not in use, calling this method will send a close request to all consumers referencing this resource. If the resource is in use, calling this method will do nothing.
        Specified by:
        closeRequest in interface Resource
        Throws:
        ResourceException

      • setData

        Description copied from interface: Resource
        Sets a custom object as this resource's extended data. This is part of a simple mechanism to allow passing further data to the resource that may be necessary for optimal treatment.
        Specified by:
